Articles.Content:
No, not on the game, silly you. ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

Like IRL, the Kerbal Space Agency has budgetary problems, every now and again. With over 50(!) active flights, the strain was unbearable. So, it was decided to abandon ALL current activities. Probes where deorbited, stations and bases where abandoned and shut down.

No, seriously, I finished the tech tree. Built [an enormous monument on Minmus](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111299-Minmus-Lighthouse) to celebrate. Then I lost inspiration for what to do next. Also, I noticed the game began to feel a bit sluggish. With not too many mods installed, I concluded my PC had trouble with keeping track of all those active flights.

It took me 4 weeks (in real life) and another 2.000.000 credits to accomplish this. But all kerbonauts are back home for the first time in 46 years. I have a feeling the sluggishness described earlier has gone too.
Now do it all again in RSS. Or maybe install outer planets and future propulsion. I've been wanting to do that as of late.
I have finished the tech tree and only made it to Duna. That seems, wrong somehow. But i do want to visit every planet before calling it quits on .90

> 
> Good........now do GT.

Ehm... Grand Tour?

- - - Updated - - -

What's ADIOS?

Struggling to keep up with 50 active flights? I wouldn't have thought so, unless your PC is really bad... Mine only got really bad at about 1700 active flights (asteroid spawning bug)...

Have you gone to EVERY planet and moon? Or just finished the tech tree? Maybe collect all the science! Or do a Jool 5, they take a lot of prep... Install the outer planets mod and go to them? RSS changes the game up a lot, which if you don't want that you could go with just 6.4x, as you can quite easily use stock parts for that (FAR makes it a bit more intuitive though)

> 
> Ehm... Grand Tour?
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> What's ADIOS?

[ADIOS](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/108785-0-90-ADIOS-Tech-Tree-V-15-12-03-2015)!

> 
> Struggling to keep up with 50 active flights? I wouldn't have thought so, unless your PC is really bad... Mine only got really bad at about 1700 active flights (asteroid spawning bug)...
> Have you gone to EVERY planet and moon? Or just finished the tech tree? Maybe collect all the science! Or do a Jool 5, they take a lot of prep... Install the outer planets mod and go to them? RSS changes the game up a lot, which if you don't want that you could go with just 6.4x, as you can quite easily use stock parts for that (FAR makes it a bit more intuitive though)

I'm not a big fan of planet packs. The game crashes enough without them ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

It's not that the framerate really dropped or something. It just felt a bit sluggish. Maybe it was me.

Since Jeb is home now, I think I will take him to every body in the solar system. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> [ADIOS](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/108785-0-90-ADIOS-Tech-Tree-V-15-12-03-2015)!

Meh...
